location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no.318 of 1853 from Captain Arnold Kemball, Resident in the Persian Gulf, to Arthur Malet, Chief Secretary of the Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter gives details of the despatch of the steam frigate Queenfrom Bushire to Bussora [Basra], with 60,000 Mahomed Shah Kraus, for transfer to the river steamer Cometand transfer to the Turkish Arabia political agency in Baghdad. For its return to the Presidency, Kemball writes that the Queenwill have on board the fifteen manumitted slaves remaining at Bassidore [Bāsa‘īdū].
